correctness.description: Accuracy of the final answer provided by the system.

reasoning_traceability.description: The ability to follow the logical steps taken by the agents to reach the answer.

steps_efficiency.description: Number of steps taken to reach the final answer relative to the minimum number of necessary steps.

resilience_to_data_contamination.description: The system's ability to avoid incorporating incorrect or misleading data from the internet into its reasoning.

web_search_effectiveness.description: The effectiveness of the web surfer agent at finding relevant and accurate information online.

info_extraction_accuracy.description: The accuracy of extracting relevant data from the web search results by the system.

task_completion.description: The agent system's success in fully addressing the task requirements and goals.

response_time.description: The time taken to provide the final answer from the moment the question was posed.
